name: Unit Projectile
description:
There is only one projectile at your disposal, and you must use it to hit objects and get a high score. After a period of time, a blue singularity will come out, and give you the challenge to precisely hit it and wipe out the entire screen.

Controls:
Move - Arrow Keys or WASD
Aim/Shoot - Mouse

Note: Windows version supports high quality sound reverb, web version doesn't.
